CustomField.description: Administrators populate this optional text field to define the group or route to which the system directs the user after the user selects a product type. The system only uses the app or route defined in this field on the initial creation of the new loan or product. By default, it is blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When the user selects a product type, the system redirects them to the app or route name entered here.
CustomField.label: Start Product Application
